extendedIngredients.name: butternut squash

extendedIngredients.originalName: roasted butternut squash, cubed (more if you like)

extendedIngredients.name: feta cheese
extendedIngredients.original: 1 ounce feta* cheese (more if you like)
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 ounce feta* cheese (more if you like)

extendedIngredients.name: pizza dough
extendedIngredients.original: pizza dough for one 12 to 14 inch pizza
extendedIngredients.originalString: pizza dough for one 12 to 14 inch pizza
extendedIngredients.originalName: pizza dough for one 12 to 14 inch pizza

title: Caramelized Onion Butternut Squash Pesto Pizza
instructions: Cook onions and roast squash.Spread dough to 12 to 14 inch circle. I prefer a thin crust, but if you like thicker go with what you like.Spread pesto evenly over crust.Top with onions and squash.Crumble feta over top.Cook at 450 degrees F for 18 to 20 minutes or until crust begins to brown around edges.Cool on a wire rack to prevent bottom from becoming soft. Serve immediately.

steps.step: Spread dough to 12 to 14 inch circle. I prefer a thin crust, but if you like thicker go with what you like.

Spread pesto evenly over crust.Top with onions and squash.Crumble feta over top.Cook at 450 degrees F for 18 to 20 minutes or until crust begins to brown around edges.Cool on a wire rack to prevent bottom from becoming soft.
